website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight formula with SPF 30 is the best way to achieve a smooth, natural look.
pros: Tinted primer is available in a range of shades
Can be worn on its own to give skin a smooth, natural look, but the lightweight formula wears beautifully under foundation as well
cons: When product gets low, pump dispenser becomes less effective

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals, but I had to return this product as it was old and expired. As soon as I put it on my face, the smell was awful. It made me call the company with the batch code and they told me that the product was expired by over 2 years. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage and goes on smoothly. The bottle design drives me crazy, but I like the product enough to keep buying! I would prefer a tube, not a pump. The product is pretty liquid at first, but when the amount in the bottle gets lower, the product becomes really thick and it won't pump. I end up taking the whole cap and pump mechanism out and use the tube to scrape out the last of the product. If the bottle worked with the product, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Silhanek

customer_reviews.title: Works alone
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite make up primer. It works as a sunscreen and is light so it doesn't cause break out. I sometimes only wear this and don't use any foundation or powder because the coverage tint works. It also prevents too much oil on your face.
customer_reviews.author: adventureswithcrystal

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing foundation
customer_reviews.text: I stopped wearing foundation years ago because it was so hot in the summer. I live in Phoenix. I tried this and loved it! It doesn't feel heavy and it looks wonderful. Evens out my skin tones and moisturizers my skin. I'm fair skinned and over 60. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yogagirl53

customer_reviews.title: Not for normal/dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product applies and the very smooth coverage. However I have normal/dry skin and this stuff really dries my skin out. By the end of the day I have to lather on face cream and oil to replenish it. Really disappointing I will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I discovered that the cream contained more liquid (it could be oil or something like that). I use it for 2 days and ...
customer_reviews.text: That is fake. I have been purchasing through Bareminerals.com for 3 years, and this is the first time I have allergies when using this product purchased through amazon. When opened the bottle, I discovered that the cream contained more liquid (it could be oil or something like that). I use it for 2 days and feel that my skin seemed to be burning really uncomfortable. I stopped using it immediately, and my skin become normal after 1 week. I think that with Cosmetic, you should go to Store or purchasing directly from the manufacture
customer_reviews.author: THU HUONG

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled Product
customer_reviews.text: This is normally a thick and velvet-like texture. This is an amazing product and I love it. This is the first time I have ordered it online and both bottles were spoiled. They were a thin liquid that smelled rancid.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: Color and Consistancy is off
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product from Amazon in the past but this time the color and consistency is not the same as the prior product. As I examined the bottle closer the print is blurry and the label is crooked. It made me question if this is a genuine bareMinerals product.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Kah

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand of BB Primer year around for about ten years. Depending on the season I have worn light, medium, and tan. This time around I ordered the Tan. I immediately noticed at the first pump it appeared dark brown with an orange tint. Upon applying it had a suffocating sticky feel. I washed it off, thought the bottle might have been “sitting” for a while so I stirred it with the pump/hose, to no avail, the outcome was the same. This is a fairly expensive for the volume of product that I was never able to use. Very disappointed will not purchase it again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KCW

customer_reviews.title: 3 products in one
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! It covers large pores well and can be used as a foundation AND it has sunscreen! A three purpose product is awesome! On summer days I'll wear this without anything else on top. When I'm dressing up I put an additional foundation over this. I have horrible dark spots from pregnancy and this lightly covers them but it is NOT a full coverage product.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyFirst

customer_reviews.title: Good product from Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Seller is prompt and efficient. I love this product except that it doesn't stay mixed up. The first usage is thin. The end of the bottle is thick. But even though that is very frustrating, I keep buying it. It is great as a pre-foundation and even as a foundation by itself when you want lighter coverage. I just wish it had better emulsifiers to keep it mixed evenly from beginning to end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Primer with a plus
customer_reviews.text: I use it to even my skin tone. It is oil mattifying, so it is great in the T zone. It also minimizes pores. Even though it is a primer, it has Sun protection factor that is so important to skin health.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Steckline

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Primer
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy at Ulta when you can save money here. The only negative is no matter where you buy it the end gets think and isn't nearly as smooth. However the tint on this makes it a great foundation when your having an awesome skin day, or sets up your make up great for a normal day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and returned immediately because it was old and thick. I exchanged it for the exact same item and received another one that was old and thick. It is hard to even pump the liquid out due to the thickness. I still had some of my other one left and compared the consistency in both bottles. The brand new one is even darker in color due to the age of it! I love this product and have used it many times but will not order from Amazon again! What you see is definitely not what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Robert berry

customer_reviews.title: TOO Dark!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the tinted Medium primer for quite some time but this batch is so dark and more orange then I'm used to so I have moved on and am now using the clear primer. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage light weight does not feel you even have it on. Drawback pump doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mungata

customer_reviews.title: What the pump?!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but the pump makes me hate it. After only one use it stopped working. I tried cleaning it off but no luck - it shoots primer everywhere! My clothes, mirror and counter all got covered the last time I tried one small squeeze. Now I'm just unscrewing the bottle and getting the product out that way, but I definitely won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Favorite BB cream ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bb cream ever. It goes in lightly, blends perfectly, feels like velvet and provides the perfect amount of coverage and adds a glow without looking like makeup. Perfection. Keep making this!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNE

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, and yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this now! I love this stuff so much!! It is perfect for summer. Before I leave the house, I just dab this on my t-zone and I’m ready to go! It does not replace regular sunscreen, but for an everyday look, it is amazing! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie10

customer_reviews.title: It goes on easy and give your complexion  a nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s rather expensive but I really like it. I can wear it alone or under my bare minerals powder.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only sunscreen my skin likes, mostly a matte finish, smoothe and doesn't break me out or sting my skin. Been buying for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Earth For Humanity~

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to the Bare Minerals product line. All of their product are as amazing as described. I thought I would try this tinted Primer after using the regular one for several years. There is a difference between the two. This one is a bit thicker than the regular so it does not apply as lightweight. I do however like the extra coverage on my uneven skin and will continue to use the tinted version.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: but was a bit taken back to see what looks like make-up on the bottle inside the box
customer_reviews.text: the product was listed as new, however, there was pen on the box. I dismissed that thinking that could happen in packaging/fulfilling order. but was a bit taken back to see what looks like make-up on the bottle inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Louise

customer_reviews.title: wonderful stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is light, moisturizes without making my skin oily. I use alone or with my Bare Mineral veil powder. It instantly takes the pink out of my skin and smooth's my complexion without looking like I have anything on. One of the very few things that do not cause breakouts or irritation to my face. If I use foundation (MaryKay) it allows to go on smoothly and makes it easier to blend. Love that it has sunscreen in it. Daily product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good primer, but why so yellow!
customer_reviews.text: What about a pinkish or neutral primer to go with my skin tone? It is just a primer so the yellow tone can be covered with your makeup. As primers go in general, it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: candid consumer

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hint of color and same priming performance as Bare Minerals original primer. Smooth and long lasting. It's just a little dark and brownish for winter but I can use it the rest of the year when I'm not pasty white.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same as what I have always purchased in store! It literally looks and feels like thick stage makeup. Perhaps someone emptied the bottle and filled it with cheap makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Great for a no makeup look!
customer_reviews.text: Not being one to use a lot of makeup this product is just right! The only negative is that it dispenses too much at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best BB cream ever. It is silky smooth and has good coverage. It’s also great because a little goes a long ways so the value is good.
customer_reviews.author: sara e

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one of these I have purchased that is like paste.
customer_reviews.text: I have had to shake this bottle before every use, It is still like paste and will not pump. So to use it I have to unscrew it and that causes overuse and contamination. Dont know what is going on. Previous bottles have been just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LMMichael

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Blendable.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and great blending power. Tinted for alittle coverage too. I use the light and it would b good for light to medium tones but it is sheer once blended in. I like it has SPF and is a primer. One product and I have my SPF and before makeup primer. Light enough for under eyes too!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good  primer
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very nice going on, and leaves your face feeling silky smooth. Definitely helps prep your face and keep your foundation set. I wish it had a tad bit more coverage, but overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Colsten

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! It is slightly tinted and I can often just wear it and a bit of concealer and head out with a super natural look. My makeup also goes over it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alida Wolff

customer_reviews.title: not quite awful
customer_reviews.text: as a super light weight tinted moisturizer, it's not terrible. It's not expensive as these things go and you can pay WAY more for way worse. I wonder why they discontinued the Erno Laszlo tinted moisturizer. I'm spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: McFadden Construction

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and makeup goes on much smoother
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite primer. I started getting it in the tinted and love it. I often wear it by itself without foundation.
customer_reviews.author: JJHERM

customer_reviews.title: Would buy on amazon again
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty clear skin so I don’t need much coverage and this is all I use. No foundation or concealer. It’s lightweight and makes my skin really smooth I love it. It lasts a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tinted primer I have used for several years. Bare minerals makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: lisa r robinson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I wear this primer sometimes on its own without foundation it has pretty good coverage by itself. Otherwise I wear it as primer. Very creamy and I love it. Wish it came in a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Beeebee123345

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! Doesn't leave skin oily and feels light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great primmer. Smooths your skin before you apply foundation. I would be lost with out it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light was too dark
customer_reviews.text: I felt like this leaned a little more towards a medium skin tone than light. I wear Birch in the bare minerals bb cream and this was too dark for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Yippee
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years by itself for a very natural look with a touch of SPF!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like a primer with spf
customer_reviews.text: Very light coverage. Feels more like a primer with spf. Don't recommend if you need better coverage, unless you use it as a primer with a powder foundation over.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mild coverage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mild coverage. I don't like thick layers of make up on my face so this works just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check when get!
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this product right away, received it on 7/19/19 As I still had some only started to use 9/1/19 It is not a fresh bottle and product is thick and will not pump out of bottle
customer_reviews.author: norma j aaron

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Skin Feel Like Silk!
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to this product. Awesome moisturizer for underneath bareMinerals foundation or I wear it alone too - enough coverage to wear alone or with a light foundation. Makes my face silky smooth. Def recommend - i can't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer but I will never order it on Amazon again. It must have been on the shelf for months before it shipped. It was very runny and oily. I could not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherd333

customer_reviews.title: It evens out the tone of my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it makes my skin look younger and natural. I don't . like foundation it's to thick I just BB primer cream after I moisturize my face and my face looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: c. Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Expired or knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is either expired or a knock off. I’ve been using this product for years and the consistency is significantly different. I wore it during a hike as my primary sunscreen and my face burned. I’ve used it for this purpose before and never had a problem. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry George

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin flawless
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this makes my skin look and it gives a bit of coverage! A little goes a long way too. I will be buying again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten watson

customer_reviews.title: Don't skip primer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, great match for me. Must have in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: shelia mixon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite makeup products... evens out skin tone and holds powder foundation on your skin for longer.
customer_reviews.author: NvMama

customer_reviews.title: But I will always buy it as the cream itself is the best, super light on your skin and makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: lots is left in the bottle though, end up by scooping it every time it ends. It is more liquids when start using and gets drier half way through the bottle. But I will always buy it as the cream itself is the best, super light on your skin and makes it silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Moshkina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light freckle cover.
customer_reviews.text: I like this because I have freckles still at 59 yrs old . I wear it under my powder. The pump sucks, but I just unscrew the cap and use it. Makes my skin feel soft. A little goes a long ways!
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchase, love this product alone or as a base.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshone Boyer

customer_reviews.title: I'll work with it
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this teinte but this one seems darker
customer_reviews.author: Lisa De Masi

customer_reviews.title: Great skin feeling and good coverate
customer_reviews.text: I really love the feel of this sunscreen. It's the only one I take traveling now. Size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: L from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure the product I received is past its use by date. It smells absolutely disgusting, like rotting compost! Also as as aside the pump doesn't work either. Would not recommend and I usually love bare minerals products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO DARK, IF YOU CAN SEND ME THE LIGHT COLOR
customer_reviews.text: TOO DARK WANT TO RETURN IT EVEN THOUGH THE TIME FRAME FOR RETURN HAS EXPIRED. IF YOU CAN SEND ME THE LIGHTER COLOR (LIGHT) WILL APPRECIATE IT. OR JUST CREDIT ME WITH THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Normandy Bonifacio

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Primes plus a touch of makeup for no light days.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA PARGAS

customer_reviews.title: Broke out so bad with this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Broke out so bad with this stuff! I usually use the oil control one which is great but this one with the light color isn't working for me
customer_reviews.author: Cody Kofron

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product will continue to use and buy right here
customer_reviews.author: krisley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!!! Goes on smooth and a little goes a long way!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my make up bag
customer_reviews.text: I wear this daily. Super light weight with some coverage and bonus SPF. Great primer!
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake bare minerals product. The color isn’t correct and it smells. Even the pump dispenser is not the ones normally used on a real bare minerals product
customer_reviews.author: AlanaM368

customer_reviews.title: It's like tinted moisturizer but better
customer_reviews.text: It's like tinted moisturizer but better. I use moisturizer and then this and skip foundation all together. It's helpful to have a foundation brush to buff out any excess.
customer_reviews.author: N2ND79

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this product is sensacional, very light , good color, good for day by day use
customer_reviews.author: Maria das Gracas Ripardo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Ran out and this shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stuff. I have used this makeup for a ...
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on it had granular in it that I had to whip off!! Terrible stuff.I have used this makeup for a long time and never had this happen. Threw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It's my go-to makeup!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived swiftly too! Some fragrances bother me, so it's great not to have to walk into Ulta for it. And it's a few dollars less here. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: MidModJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great finish, nice and lightweight on skin and great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved his product, I was super happy to find it on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it more than I can even say
customer_reviews.text: This product is so smooth, so flattering, and so lightweight. I love it more than I can even say.
customer_reviews.author: alene k latimer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon deliveries are much easier than going shoppind
customer_reviews.text: It is makeup. I use it daily. Amazon delivery is much faster and easier than going to a store!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hubner

customer_reviews.title: it was a good primer to use
customer_reviews.text: it was a good primer to use, it covered well and gives great spf coverage underneath a bronzer. light weight, feels like your not wearing any make up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. smooth's out skin flaws. use under a foundation or under powder for a lighter look
customer_reviews.author: florida reader

customer_reviews.title: The best price
customer_reviews.text: The best price I could find! Delivery was unexpected fast - just 1 day. The product is real.
customer_reviews.author: Tortuga

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as promised
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy order that came on time and for a competitive price
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with my last bottle, it is too thick to come out the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: gives you that dull, greyish
customer_reviews.text: If your black, or have brown skin stay away from this, gives you that dull, greyish, zombie-like color. Used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smoothly and feels like silk. It helps to keep my mineral base ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and feels like silk. It helps to keep my mineral base in place for so much longer.
customer_reviews.author: The Spiral Mom

customer_reviews.title: It is light feeling not heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is light feeling not heavy. I use it without foundation. Rarely use powder, if I do it is BareMinerals mineral veil powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Also a good concealer. Have been a fan for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bogey4u

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: No foundation needed. Quick on a hurried day. Add a little mineral veil and you look so pretty and natural!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Smooth & soft
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth & leaves skin soft & it is not greasy
customer_reviews.author: kari anne

customer_reviews.title: I love this Primer and use it as my makeup for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Primer and use it as my makeup for the day. It is very natural and light, perfect for hot Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen and with color which makes it even better. Love bareMinerals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely way, well packaged and I had used this once before and loved it (for under my eyes). I have very sensitive skin and allergic to so many products but this doesn't bother me. I first tried Fair as I have very light skin, but it seemed a bit too fair so tried the Light. That seems just right but then I use a product over this so it almost doesn't matter. Very gentle and makes you skin look younger!
customer_reviews.author: PMGermaine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product!! Goes on easily, don't have to use a lot and has SPF that doesn't make me break out. I have very sensitive skin and have to be very careful what I put on it. This is the best I have found. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Sheer coverage
customer_reviews.text: Sheer coverage that stays put, even during hot, humid weather. Just wish the pump would work better because it stops dispensing product half way through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepup

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear this over moisturizer and under makeup. Keeps everything fresh looking throughout the day, and makes application of color cosmetics easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Kmitch

customer_reviews.title: My skin
customer_reviews.text: I have worked as a beauty consultant and i love bare minerals
customer_reviews.author: sheri Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: Change the PUMP bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not one that works in a pump bottle. It is too thick and clogs the pump. I like the product very much and buy now assuming the pump will be useless. Please change the container.
customer_reviews.author: Momilley

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i like this primer - never used one before - it goes on smoothly and i wear instead of a foundation - however, i can not believe this was one ounce - i only use once a day and very lightly - yet the bottle appears empty after only a couple of weeks use - well, i just opened it up and there seems to be quite a bit but very thick - i think it's because i didn't shake the bottle before using until i read here that's what you must do. thank the Lord for amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: katydids

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, excellent service from this vendor I love this primer- it is very light and airy and goes on smoothly. There are times, in this heat, that this is all I wear. The light tint gives me just enough coverage
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: It has good coverage  for the face to wear alone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this bare minerals primer cream for my face.,I really like that it comes in shades. I chose the medium. I use it under my foundation but during the summer it looked great alone with nice coverage to cover slight blemishes & age spots, and its coverage felt like moisturizer. It looked great and has the SPF 30 protection. I have come up with a problem that the pump has stopped working, and the bottle has only been used a few times. I am not sure I will order this again, I am using Q-tips to spread the primer on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie C. Mac Innes

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Sarah McNamara fan for years but it's gone now so have been looking for a substitute. This is it! Just make sure that you get the right color. I went with medium in the beginning but it seemed to oxidize and appear darker by afternoon. I next bought the light and it is perfect. I'll save the dark for the summer but love this product. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: light weight, great coverage, non greasy
customer_reviews.text: pleasantly surprised! great coverage, light weight, non greasy, easy application. has a slight velvety finish with out looking matte, which I welcome. I am a former make up artist, so I am always skeptical. I saw how tiny the item was and was disappointed, but 1 pump is more than enough for generous coverage of my big face. The price is great! I'd buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee Rider

customer_reviews.title: Keep coming back for more!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day, and love it. The coverage is just enough, and it doesn't irritate my very fair, and sensitive skin. I've learned over the several bottles I've purchased of this to be diligent about thoroughly shaking before every use, or it separates. I also don't use the pump, as it doesn't seem to work very well, but unscrewing the top, and using the straw as a dip stick works just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have highly sensitive skin and rarely can find a product that my face will tolerate time over time. I use this product as a primer as well as overall coverage. I am 45 - I need some coverage, however I cannot handle any type of foundation. This is the perfect product to smooth things over and provide some coverage that evens out my skin. I use it after I apply my face cream and put nothing on top.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

product_meta.title: Bare Escentuals Prime Time Bb Primer Cream Spf 30, Light, 1 Fl Oz
